topic.title: Cancer End of Treatment Summary Plan
topic.shortdesc: A Cancer End of Treatment Summary Plan (EOTS) is a document produced by secondary cancer CARE PROFESSIONALS at the end of treatment and sent to the PATIENT’s GENERAL PRACTITIONER.
